title: Build Velora MVP: 30-day program with premium gating, Text Softly generator, journal, and profile screens

requirements.text: Implement the global Velora design system across the app: use the provided color palette (#F6C1C7 blush pink, #FDF6EC warm cream, #D4AF7F soft gold, #E7A9B0 muted rose), typography (Playfair Display for headings, Montserrat or Lato for body, Great Vibes for affirmations/quotes), rounded components, soft shadows, subtle gradients, gentle fade-in animations, and consistent spacing/layout patterns.

quotes: Color Palette ... Fonts ... Extra Features

acceptanceCriteria: All primary surfaces/buttons/cards use the specified palette and avoid off-brand colors
Headings render in Playfair Display; body copy renders in Montserrat or Lato; affirmation/quote text renders in Great Vibes
Buttons and cards are rounded with soft shadows; screens use soft gradients and gentle fade-in transitions

requirements.text: Create the Splash Screen UI with a blush pink gradient background, a typographic logo reading “Velora” (Playfair Display with a soft-gold accent treatment), the tagline “Love deeply. Stay whole.”, and a primary CTA button labeled “Start Your Journey” (cream background, blush text, rounded). Navigating via the CTA should move the user to the Welcome Screen.

quotes: 1️⃣ Splash Screen ... Button: "Start Your Journey"

acceptanceCriteria: Splash screen matches specified background, logo, tagline, and CTA styling
Clicking/tapping “Start Your Journey” navigates to the Welcome Screen

requirements.text: Create the Welcome Screen where the user selects a relationship/status from exactly: “Single”, “In a relationship”, “Healing”, “Married”. Use a soft card layout with muted rose borders and a rounded gold “Continue” button. Persist the selected status for the user and proceed to the Home/Daily Program screen on Continue.

quotes:
2️⃣ Welcome Screen

User selects status: Single / In a relationship / Healing / Married

Soft card layout with muted rose borders

Continue button: Rounded gold button

acceptanceCriteria: User can select exactly one of the four statuses and see clear selected-state styling
Continue is disabled until a status is selected (or an equivalent clear validation is present)
Selected status is persisted and available on subsequent app loads/sign-ins
Continue navigates to the Home/Daily Program screen

requirements.text: Implement the Home / Daily Program screen for a 30-day program: show a day header (e.g., “Day 1 – Your Soft Feminine Glow”), a lesson card (blush pink card with Playfair heading + Montserrat/Lato body), a centered daily affirmation rendered in Great Vibes with soft rose color, and Next/Previous navigation buttons with gold accents. The user must be able to move between days 1–30.

quotes:
3️⃣ Home / Daily Program

Header: "Day 1 – Your Soft Feminine Glow"

Lesson Card: Blush Pink card, Playfair Display heading, Montserrat body

Daily Affirmation: Centered, Great Vibes font, soft rose color

Navigation: Next / Previous buttons, gold accents

acceptanceCriteria: User can navigate forward/backward across days 1–30 with clear disabled states at boundaries
Each day shows a title, lesson body text, and an affirmation area with Great Vibes styling
Transitions between days use gentle fade-in animation

requirements.text: Implement premium gating rules and UI across the app: free users can access only the first 3 days of the 30-day program; premium users can access all 30 days plus Text Softly scripts, Journal, and Audio Lessons. Premium-only content must be clearly labeled/visually separated, and locked items must show padlock indicators. No ads should be shown anywhere in the MVP.

quotes:
Monetization Flow

Free: First 3 days of the 30-Day Program

Premium: ₦2,500/month, full 30-day program, Text Softly scripts, Journal access, Audio lessons

Ads: None at launch
Premium content clearly separated for subscription
Locked content: Soft padlock icons

acceptanceCriteria: Non-premium users cannot open days 4–30; attempting to access prompts the premium upgrade path
Text Softly, Journal, and Audio Lessons are inaccessible for non-premium users and show locked UI states
Premium users can access days 1–30 and all premium tabs/features
No ad components or ad placeholders are present

requirements.text: Create the Premium Features screen with tabs labeled exactly “Text Softly”, “Journal”, and “Audio Lessons”. Show locked content indicators (padlock icons) when the user is not premium. Include a primary CTA button labeled exactly “Unlock Full Program – ₦2,500/month” with a blush gradient background that initiates the premium upgrade flow in-app (MVP: implement as an app-internal upgrade action that toggles/stores premium status; no external ads).

quotes:
4️⃣ Premium Features Screen

Tabs: Text Softly / Journal / Audio Lessons

Locked content: Soft padlock icons

Button: "Unlock Full Program – ₦2,500/month" (Blush gradient background)

acceptanceCriteria: Premium Features screen displays the 3 tabs with correct labels
If user is not premium, premium-only areas show padlock icons and a clear locked message/state
The “Unlock Full Program – ₦2,500/month” CTA updates premium status for the signed-in user and unlocks premium features immediately
Premium state persists across reloads for the same user

requirements.text: Implement the Text Softly Generator screen: show category cards for exactly “Pull Away”, “Flirty”, “Apology”, “Missing You”, and “Boundaries”. When a category is chosen, display a randomly generated text message in a speech-bubble style. Include a favorite (heart) toggle for the displayed/generated message and maintain a per-user list of favorites. Access must be premium-gated per the monetization rules.

quotes:
5️⃣ Text Softly Generator

Categories: Pull Away / Flirty / Apology / Missing You / Boundaries

Rounded cards for each category

Displays a randomly generated text in a speech bubble style

Favorite option: Heart icon, soft pink

acceptanceCriteria: Only premium users can use the generator; non-premium users see a locked state and upgrade CTA
Selecting a category generates and displays a message in a speech-bubble UI
User can favorite/unfavorite a generated message with a heart toggle
Favorites persist per user and are visible again after refresh/sign-in

requirements.text: Implement the Journal screen with a lined-entry style on a cream background, header text exactly “My Private Thoughts” (Playfair Display), an “Add Entry” CTA styled as a rounded blush card with gold accent text, and a “Save” button styled as a soft rose bubble. Journal entries must be stored privately per user and gated to premium users.

quotes:
6️⃣ Journal Screen

Lined entry style on cream background

Header: "My Private Thoughts" (Playfair Display)

Add Entry button: Rounded blush card, gold accent text

Save button: Soft rose bubble
Premium: ... Journal access

acceptanceCriteria: Only premium users can create/view journal entries; non-premium users see locked state and upgrade CTA
User can add a new entry, input text, and save it
Saved entries persist per user and are visible on subsequent app loads for that user
Journal UI uses the lined paper styling and specified button treatments

requirements.text: Create the Profile / Settings screen with a blush pink fade background, user info including optional nickname, a subscription status indicator that shows a gold badge when premium, and settings options rendered with soft rose minimalist icons. Persist nickname and display it across the app where appropriate.

quotes:
7️⃣ Profile / Settings

Background: Blush pink fade

User info (nickname optional)

Subscription Status: Gold badge if premium

Settings icons: Soft rose minimalist icons

acceptanceCriteria: User can set/update an optional nickname and it persists per user
Premium users see a gold premium badge; non-premium users do not
Settings list renders with minimalist soft-rose icons and consistent Velora styling

requirements.text: Add app-wide user identity support using Internet Identity so that status selection, premium status, favorites, and journal entries are stored per user principal. The app should handle signed-out state gracefully (e.g., allow browsing public/free portions, but require sign-in for saving personal data).

quotes: My Private Thoughts
Favorite option: Heart icon, soft pink
User selects status ... Persist the selected status
Subscription Status: Gold badge if premium

acceptanceCriteria: User can sign in/out with Internet Identity
User-specific data (status, nickname, premium flag, favorites, journal entries) is scoped to the signed-in principal
If signed out, the app clearly prompts for sign-in when attempting to save personal data (journal/favorites/profile changes)

requirements.text: Backend: implement Motoko canister APIs and stable storage for per-user profile (status, optional nickname, premium flag), Text Softly favorites, and journal entries. Ensure data survives canister upgrades using stable data patterns consistent with the single-actor architecture.

quotes: User info (nickname optional)
Subscription Status: Gold badge if premium
Favorite option: Heart icon, soft pink
Journal Screen ... Save

acceptanceCriteria: Canister exposes query/update methods to get/set profile fields, premium status, favorites list, and journal entries
All stored data is keyed by caller principal
Data persists across reloads and is designed to be stable across upgrades (no runtime-only loss)

requirements.text: Implement Audio Lessons as a premium-gated section reachable from the Premium Features tabs. For the MVP, provide a simple list UI (titles + locked states for non-premium) consistent with the Velora theme; playback can be represented as non-functional placeholders unless audio assets are provided.

quotes:
4️⃣ Premium Features Screen

Tabs: Text Softly / Journal / Audio Lessons
Premium: ... Audio lessons

acceptanceCriteria: Audio Lessons tab exists and is premium-gated
Non-premium users see locked UI; premium users can view the list
UI matches the global theme and uses consistent card/button patterns

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
Do not modify any frontend files under frontend.immutablePaths (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not add ads anywhere in the MVP.
nonGoals: Integrating real payment processing (e.g., Stripe) or app-store subscriptions in this MVP unless explicitly added later.
Third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity.

required: Subtle floral corner accent illustration, blush/rose/gold on transparent background (floral-corner-accent.dim_512x512.png)
Minimalist soft-rose padlock icon on transparent background (icon-padlock-softrose.dim_128x128.png)
Minimalist soft-pink heart icon on transparent background (icon-heart-softpink.dim_128x128.png)
